pullRequest.title: Fix #2226: SharedIndexInformer for non-namespaced resources not working
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fix #2226
We are using BaseOperation for all list/watch operations in SharedInformerFactory, but
we are not aware of whether the resource is namespaced or not. This PR modifies code in
BaseOperation to read it from the annotation inside class of Kubernetes resource.

nodes.bodyText: are you sure about the tab spacing here?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -30,29 +30,36 @@ type PackageDescriptor struct {
 }
 
 type schemaGenerator struct {
-	types              map[reflect.Type]*JSONObjectDescriptor
-	typeNames          map[reflect.Type]string
-	customTypeNames    map[string]string
-	packages           map[string]PackageDescriptor
-	typeMap            map[reflect.Type]reflect.Type
+	types           map[reflect.Type]*JSONObjectDescriptor
+	typeNames       map[reflect.Type]string
+	customTypeNames map[string]string

nodes.bodyText:
I see that you're trying to create an enumeration here. I suggest using iota

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            	Namespaced CrdScope = 0
          
          
            
            	Cluster    CrdScope = 1
          
          
            
            	Namespaced CrdScope = iota
          
          
            
            	Cluster    CrdScope = iota
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -30,29 +30,36 @@ type PackageDescriptor struct {
 }
 
 type schemaGenerator struct {
-	types              map[reflect.Type]*JSONObjectDescriptor
-	typeNames          map[reflect.Type]string
-	customTypeNames    map[string]string
-	packages           map[string]PackageDescriptor
-	typeMap            map[reflect.Type]reflect.Type
+	types           map[reflect.Type]*JSONObjectDescriptor
+	typeNames       map[reflect.Type]string
+	customTypeNames map[string]string
+	packages        map[string]PackageDescriptor
+	typeMap         map[reflect.Type]reflect.Type
 }
 
-func GenerateSchema(t reflect.Type, packages []PackageDescriptor, typeMap map[reflect.Type]reflect.Type, customTypeNames  map[string]string, moduleName string) (*JSONSchema, error) {
+type CrdScope int32
+
+const (
+	Namespaced CrdScope = 0
+	Cluster    CrdScope = 1

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            	switch t.Name() {
          
          
            
            	case "MutatingWebhookConfiguration",
          
          
            
            		"ValidatingWebhookConfiguration",
          
          
            
            		"CustomResourceDefinition",
          
          
            
            		"ComponentStatus",
          
          
            
            		"Namespace",
          
          
            
            		"Node",
          
          
            
            		"PersistentVolume",
          
          
            
            		"PodSecurityPolicy",
          
          
            
            		"ClusterRoleBinding",
          
          
            
            		"ClusterRole",
          
          
            
            		"PriorityClass",
          
          
            
            		"StorageClass":
          
          
            
            		return Cluster
          
          
            
            	}
          
          
            
            	return Namespaced
          
          
            
            	switch t.Name() {
          
          
            
            	case "MutatingWebhookConfiguration",
          
          
            
            		"ValidatingWebhookConfiguration",
          
          
            
            		"CustomResourceDefinition",
          
          
            
            		"ComponentStatus",
          
          
            
            		"Namespace",
          
          
            
            		"Node",
          
          
            
            		"PersistentVolume",
          
          
            
            		"PodSecurityPolicy",
          
          
            
            		"ClusterRoleBinding",
          
          
            
            		"ClusterRole",
          
          
            
            		"PriorityClass",
          
          
            
            		"StorageClass":
          
          
            
                        return Cluster
          
          
            
            	default:
          
          
            
            	    return Namespaced    
          
          
            
            	}
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -541,3 +553,22 @@ func (g *schemaGenerator) addConstraints(objectName string, propName string, pro
 func pkgPath(t reflect.Type) string {
 	return strings.TrimPrefix(t.PkgPath(), "github.com/fabric8io/kubernetes-client/kubernetes-model/vendor/")
 }
+
+func (g *schemaGenerator) crdScope(t reflect.Type) CrdScope {
+	switch t.Name() {
+	case "MutatingWebhookConfiguration",
+		"ValidatingWebhookConfiguration",
+		"CustomResourceDefinition",
+		"ComponentStatus",
+		"Namespace",
+		"Node",
+		"PersistentVolume",
+		"PodSecurityPolicy",
+		"ClusterRoleBinding",
+		"ClusterRole",
+		"PriorityClass",
+		"StorageClass":
+		return Cluster
+	}
+	return Namespaced

commit.message:
Fix #2226: SharedIndexInformer for non-namespaced resources not working

We are using BaseOperation for all list/watch operations in SharedInformerFactory, but
we are not aware of whether the resource is namespaced or not. This PR modifies code in
BaseOperation to read it from the annotation inside class of Kubernetes resource.
Updated Kubernetes Model to use Namespaced interface instead of annotation

Fix failing tests

+ Fix failing PodCrudTest
+ Added Namespaced interface in Custom Resources used in tests
